# Orc - Documentation Index

> AI-powered task orchestration with phased execution, git worktree isolation, and multi-round review.

## Quick Start

- CLAUDE.md (182 lines) - Project overview, core concepts
- docs/architecture/OVERVIEW.md - System architecture
- docs/specs/CLI.md - Command reference

## By Task

### Understanding the System
- CLAUDE.md - Start here
- docs/architecture/OVERVIEW.md - Architecture overview
- docs/architecture/TASK_MODEL.md - Task structure, weights, lifecycle
- docs/architecture/PHASE_MODEL.md - Phase definitions, execution flow

### Working with Tasks
- CLAUDE.md#commands - CLI quick reference
- internal/cli/CLAUDE.md - Full CLI documentation
- docs/specs/CLI.md - CLI specification
- docs/specs/FILE_FORMATS.md - task.yaml, plan.yaml, state.yaml

### Implementing Features
- internal/CLAUDE.md - Package overview
- internal/executor/CLAUDE.md - Phase execution engine
- docs/architecture/EXECUTOR.md - Execution deep-dive
- docs/specs/COMPLETION_CRITERIA.md - Phase completion rules

### Working with API
- docs/API_REFERENCE.md - All REST endpoints
- internal/api/CLAUDE.md - API server architecture

### Frontend Development
- web/CLAUDE.md (155 lines) - Frontend overview
- web/QUICKREF.md - Code patterns, components
- docs/specs/WEB_DASHBOARD.md - UI specification
- docs/specs/KEYBOARD_SHORTCUTS.md - Shortcuts spec

### Configuration
- docs/specs/CONFIG_HIERARCHY.md - Full config reference
- docs/specs/DATABASE_ABSTRACTION.md - Storage modes

### Git Integration
- docs/architecture/GIT_INTEGRATION.md - Branches, worktrees
- internal/git/CLAUDE.md - Git operations

### Testing
- internal/CLAUDE.md#testing - Test isolation patterns
- docs/guides/TROUBLESHOOTING.md - Common issues

## By Directory

### Root
- CLAUDE.md - Project instructions (182 lines)
- README.md - User-facing overview
- llms.txt - This index

### docs/
- CLAUDE.md - Documentation index
- API_REFERENCE.md - REST API endpoints
- architecture/ - System architecture (6 docs)
- specs/ - Feature specifications (23 docs)
- decisions/ - ADRs (7 docs)
- research/ - Research notes (4 docs)
- guides/ - Troubleshooting

### internal/
- CLAUDE.md - Package overview (142 lines)
- api/CLAUDE.md - REST server
- bootstrap/CLAUDE.md - Project init
- cli/CLAUDE.md - Commands (199 lines)
- db/CLAUDE.md - SQLite persistence
- executor/CLAUDE.md - Phase execution (270 lines)
- initiative/CLAUDE.md - Task grouping
- orchestrator/CLAUDE.md - High-level orchestration
- plan_session/CLAUDE.md - Interactive planning
- planner/CLAUDE.md - Plan generation
- setup/CLAUDE.md - Claude-powered setup
- spec/CLAUDE.md - Spec generation

### templates/
- CLAUDE.md - Template system
- prompts/ - Phase prompt templates (10 files)

### web/
- CLAUDE.md - Frontend overview (155 lines)
- QUICKREF.md - Code patterns, deep-dives

## Architecture Decision Records

- ADR-001 - Language and stack (Go + Svelte 5)
- ADR-002 - Storage model (YAML, git-tracked)
- ADR-003 - Git integration (branches, worktrees)
- ADR-004 - UI framework (Svelte 5)
- ADR-005 - Task weight system
- ADR-006 - Execution model (Ralph-style)
- ADR-007 - Human gates

## Key Specifications

| Spec | Purpose | Size |
|------|---------|------|
| CONFIG_HIERARCHY.md | Config loading, env vars | 25K |
| DATABASE_ABSTRACTION.md | Storage backends | 30K |
| TEAM_ARCHITECTURE.md | Multi-user support | 27K |
| P2P_COORDINATION.md | Distributed tasks | 39K |
| REALTIME_COLLABORATION.md | WebSocket sync | 34K |
| VALIDATION_FIXES.md | Error handling | 34K |

## Research Documents

- RALPH_WIGGUM.md - Ralph-style loop patterns
- PATTERNS.md - Orchestration patterns
- AGENT_FRAMEWORKS.md - Framework comparison
- CLAUDE_TOOLS.md - Claude Code tools analysis
